Message.Title: Idiot boy
Message.Msg: Good call Cramer KO up over 2% and A 10% divi increase, I will sell when Buffet sells!When ever I am in a restraunt or sporting event I never here anybody ask for a Pepsi its always a Coke ,and I bet its like that in every country outside the USA! IMHO KO is one of the best buy and holds,51 divi increases it does not get better than that!
I refer to Coke as Georgia's finest wine.

Topic.Title: Olive Garden warns huge ! follows Mcdonalds and Walmart !!!!!!!!!!!

Message.Msg: Don't follow your logic on distribution costs. KO delivers drinks as syrups to the Darden warehouses and the restaurants serve it as fountain drinks. KO has been using hybrid trucks for about 5 years and saving quite a bit on fuel for local distribution of its cans and bottles.

Topic.Title: Money maker here:ILNS gapping for big upside

Message.Msg: Shares sell for a penny a piece when a company is worthless.
